roleset.name: nominating again
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, nomination.01. Corresponds to VNcls Vncls appoint-29.1.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: The last time something like this happened that I know of ; was the republican convention in New York for the renomination of Bush Jr for a second term in office .
example.arg: for a second term in office
